item.title: Small release that may help some
item.dc:creator: @RSCDevil RSCDevil
item.description:
@RSCDevil wrote:

I seen there was only the option for making dragon square through klank by paying him gold. It inspired me to try to create this, didn’t see anyone release this so I figured I’d release it to help anyone who needs it out.

case 50: if(item.getID() == 1277) { // Dragon Square) if(player.getInventory().countId(1276) < 1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need the other half of the shield."); return; } if(owner.getInventory().countId(168) < 1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a hammer to make this."); return; } if(owner.getCurStat(13) < 60) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a smithing level of 60 to make this"); return; } owner.setBusy(true); owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You hammer away at the shield halves."); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { if(player.getInventory().remove(1276, 1) > -1 && player.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("you successfully make the honourable Dragon Square Shield."); owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(1278, 1)); owner.incExp(13, 2000, true, true); owner.getActionSender().sendStat(13); owner.getActionSender().sendInventory(); } owner.setBusy(false); } }); } if(item.getID() == 1276) { // Dragon Square) if(player.getInventory().countId(1277) < 1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need the other half of the shield."); return; } if(owner.getInventory().countId(168) < 1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a hammer to make this."); return; } if(owner.getCurStat(13) < 60) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need a smithing level of 60 to make this"); return; } owner.setBusy(true); owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You hammer away at the shield halves."); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) { public void action() { if(player.getInventory().remove(1277, 1) > -1 && player.getInventory().remove(item) > -1) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("you successfully make the honourable Dragon Square Shield."); owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(1278, 1)); owner.incExp(13, 2000, true, true); owner.getActionSender().sendStat(13); owner.getActionSender().sendInventory(); } owner.setBusy(false); } }); }

In InvUseOnObject.java place this code right above this:

Its fully functional, requires 60 smithing and a hammer to make the dragon square just like on real rsc.

You receive 2000 smithing exp for creating the dragon square shield, this can be changed to whatever you feel is necessary by changing this:

I hope this helps some people

Read full topic
item.source: Small release that may help some
